    • save

      @Internal public void save(ServerWorld.Region region, DataOutputStream stream, boolean dispose) throws IOException
      Saves a region to an output stream.
      Parameters:
      region - the region to save.
      stream - the output stream to save to.
      dispose - if true, the region will be disposed after saving.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs.

      Loads a region from an input stream.
      Parameters:

      stream - the input stream to load from.
      Returns:

      Throws:

    • getRegionAt

      @Nullable public @Nullable ServerWorld.Region getRegionAt(ChunkPos chunkPos)
      Gets a loaded region from the storage map based on the given chunk position.
      Parameters:
      chunkPos - the chunk position.
      Returns:
      the loaded region, or null if it isn't loaded.
